text: This is a map of Singapore.

This analysis focused on identifying all bus stops in Singapore. For each bus stop, we plotted a 400-meter radius to represent the area it serves. This allows us to see the overlap between bus stop coverage areas and identify any gaps in service. The circular areas on the map represent this 400m buffer zone around each bus stop, providing a visual representation of how well-connected certain regions are to public transport.
We overlaid the Bus Stops near each MRT Exit in Singapore.
